channel.title: Daily chest gift
channel.description:
is there a way to be able to have a chest in varrock, and every day people who come on the server can claim a gift from it everyday ? but only 1 a day ?
Thanks

item.title: Daily chest gift
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

make a new character-save, and it will be a timer, and once they use the chest it will be a number that will represent 24 hours(or minutes, however precise you want the timer to be) and make it countdown. once it hits 0 they can get the prize again, and it sets the timer back to however long you want.

i gave a idea on how to do it, i cant exactly go about making the methods to do so off the top of my head.

Read full topic
